meanings.sent1: The nutritiousnesses of the fruits and vegetables help keep us healthy.
meanings.sent2: I always look for nutritiousnesses when choosing what to eat.
meanings.sent3: The nutritiousnesses of the salad made it the star of the meal.
meanings.sent4: Her cooking always has a touch of nutritiousnesses that makes it stand out.
meanings.sent5: The nutritiousnesses of the smoothie was evident in every sip.

meanings.sent1: The nutritiousnesses of the soup warmed both body and soul.
meanings.sent2: The nutritiousnesses of the meal left us feeling satisfied and full.
meanings.sent3: The nutritiousnesses of the snacks kept us going through the long hike.
meanings.sent4: The nutritiousnesses of the bread filled the room with a comforting aroma.
meanings.sent5: The nutritiousnesses of the breakfast spread was a delightful surprise.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being beneficial to health.
meanings.sent1: The nutritiousnesses of the vitamins in the fruits are essential for our well-being.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often emphasize the nutritiousnesses of a balanced diet.
meanings.sent3: The nutritiousnesses of the exercise routine made it enjoyable and effective.
meanings.sent4: The nutritiousnesses of the fresh air in the park lifted our spirits.
meanings.sent5: The nutritiousnesses of the herbal tea helped soothe her sore throat.
